subject: Need guidance
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a query. In our team we are planning to establish unit testing using any useful tool. Our application is an embedded application using C++. I
messageBody:
Hi all,



I have a query.

In our team we are planning to establish unit testing using any useful tool.

Our application is an embedded application using C++.

I heard that CPPUnit is a freeware which can be effectively used for unit
testing.

We need some guidance regarding this. Can anyone suggest me some good
material or web links where I can get detailed explanations or any training
institutions in Pune - India.



Can any one guide me regarding this?

Please reply soon.



Lokam





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
